hero.title: BELLOWS COVERS
body: At Signage Products, we manufacture custom-engineered bellows covers designed to meet specific machine geometry, movement, and environmental requirements. Each bellows cover is produced to precise dimensions, ensuring consistent folding, smooth operation, and long service life.

We work with a wide range of coated and technical fabrics, including PVC-coated polyester, PU-coated materials, and specialized technical fabrics, selected based on application conditions such as abrasion, temperature, and exposure to dust, oil, or moisture.
From single prototypes to series production, we focus on precision fabrication, material consistency, and application-specific performance.

cards.title: SEWN BELLOWS
cards.description: Fabric bellows constructed using industrial stitching techniques, suitable for general protection applications with controlled flexibility and cost efficiency.

cards.title: THERMO-WELDED
cards.description: Manufactured from thermoplastic-coated fabrics, precision-pleated and heat-welded to integrated PVC stiffeners at each fold, resulting in a sealed construction without stitched seams or needle holes.

cards.title: LAMELLA BELLOWS
cards.description: Heavy-duty bellows incorporating stainless steel lamella plates mounted over each convolution, designed for applications involving hot chips, sparks, and high mechanical abrasion.

type_sections_with_pictures.title: Thermo Weld or Heat Sealed Bellows
body: Heat-Sealed Bellows Covers are manufactured from a single sheet of thermoplastic-coated technical fabric that is precision-pleated and heat-welded to PVC stiffeners at each fold. This process creates a uniform, sealed construction without stitched seams or needle holes, improving resistance to fine particles, light abrasives, oil, chips, and liquid exposure. The design can be produced in various shapes and sizes, with optional stainless-steel reinforcements for applications requiring enhanced protection against sparks or hot chips.

type_sections_with_pictures.title: Lamella Bellows
body: Our Lamella Bellows are manufactured using a precision-folded base bellows combined with integrated stainless steel lamella plates at each convolution. The lamella elements are mechanically attached to the bellows structure to provide enhanced resistance against hot chips, sparks, and abrasive debris, while maintaining controlled folding and smooth operation. Depending on application requirements, the base bellows can be produced using heat-sealed or sewn construction, with designs optimized for compact compression, repeatable movement, and long service life in demanding operating environments.

type_sections_with_pictures.title: Conventional Sewn Bellows
body: These are authentic general purpose bellows manufactured with internal PVC support glued with an extenal PVC coating, resistant to dust, coolants spray, temperatures ranging from 30C to 75C. It also comes with lamellas, scissor frames etc to meet the complicated requirements of the machines.

materials_expertise.title: MATERIALS EXPERTISE
materials_expertise.note: Material selection is based on application conditions such as abrasion, temperature, chemical exposure, and movement cycles.

design_and_customisation.title: DESIGN & CUSTOMISATION
design_and_customisation.note: All bellows are custom-manufactured to match machine geometry and operating parameters:
items: Rectangular, square, circular, tapered, and complex profiles
Customized fold pitch, stroke length, and compression ratio
Optional internal PVC stiffeners, frames, or guide elements
Multiple mounting solutions to suit customer interfaces
Designs are optimized for smooth movement, dimensional stability, and long service life.

manufacturing_capabilities.title: MANUFACTURING CAPABILITIES
items: Integration of PVC stiffeners and metal reinforcements
Consistent batch production with repeatable quality
manufacturing_capabilities.note: We support prototype development, small batches, and series production.

quality_focus.title: QUALITY FOCUS
items: Visual and functional inspection at key stages
Focus on durability under repetitive motion

hero.title: WAY WIPERS / WIPER SYSTEMS
body: Way wipers are critical protection components mounted on machine carriages to continuously clean and seal guideways during operation. They prevent chips, dust, coolant, and debris from entering sensitive sliding or rolling surfaces.
An effective wiper system directly improves machine accuracy, reduces maintenance, and prolongs guideway life.

hero_media.note: PictureS OF FORMED WIPERS AND MOULDED WIPERS.

cards.title: MOULDED WIPERS
cards.description: Precision-moulded wipers designed for consistent geometry, reliable sealing, and repeatable OEM performance.

cards.title: FORMED WIPERS
cards.description: Formed wipers manufactured from wear-resistant strips and shaped to suit specific guideway profiles and mounting conditions.

type_sections_with_pictures.title: MOULDED WIPERS
body: Precision-moulded wipers designed for consistent geometry, reliable sealing, and repeatable OEM performance.
Suitable for series production and long-term supply programs
Features:
Injection or compression moulded for uniform profile accuracy
Stable wiping pressure across the full guideway length
Excellent resistance to oils, coolants, and wear
Applications:
CNC machine tools
Linear guideways and box ways
OEM-standardised machine designs

type_sections_with_pictures.title: FORMED WIPERS
body: Formed Way Wipers
Formed wipers manufactured from wear-resistant strips and shaped to suit specific guideway profiles and mounting conditions.
Features:
Flexible design for non-standard or retrofit applications
Good wiping efficiency with controlled contact pressure
Cost-effective solution for low to medium volumes
Applications:
Retrofit and replacement wipers
Custom or legacy machine designs
General industrial machinery

type_sections_with_pictures.title: Guard Wipers
body: Guard wipers are designed to protect exposed machine components by preventing chips, dust, coolant, and debris from entering critical guideways and moving parts. Installed at strategic interfaces on machine guards and covers, they act as a first line of defence, reducing wear and extending machine service life.

Our guard wipers are manufactured for CNC machines and industrial equipment where reliable sealing and consistent wiping performance are essential. They are suitable for both OEM installations and retrofit or replacement applications.

Available in a range of profiles, sizes, and materials, guard wipers can be customised to suit specific machine geometries, operating speeds, and environmental conditions. Material options offer resistance to oils, coolants, and fine or abrasive particles, ensuring dependable performance in demanding shop-floor environments.

Designed for easy integration with machine guards, way covers, and bellows systems, our guard wipers provide a cost-effective solution for improving machine protection and reducing maintenance downtime.

materials_expertise.title: MATERIAL OPTIONS
materials_expertise.note: Wiper materials are selected based on guideway type, operating speed, and environmental exposure:

hero.title: APRON COVERS
body: Apron covers offer a compact and reliable solution for protecting machine tool guideways where space limitations or design constraints make telescopic covers impractical. Their lightweight design and flexible construction allow smooth machine operation while effectively shielding critical components from contaminants—helping improve machine reliability, reduce maintenance, and extend service life.

materials_expertise.title: MATERIALS & CONSTRUCTION
items: Optional reinforced edges for high-wear conditions

design_and_customisation.title: CUSTOM & OPTIONAL CAPABILITIES
items: Custom lengths, widths, and stroke configurations
Aluminum apron, coated fabric apron, or hybrid constructions
Reinforced edges or wear-resistant layers for high-chip load applications
Mounting options tailored to machine design and installation constraints
High-temperature and heavy-duty variants available on request
Designed to integrate with existing machine protection systems
Integration with bellows and way wiper systems

hero.title: ROLL-UP (ROLL WAY) COVERS
body: Roll-up way covers are compact protection solutions designed to safeguard guideways, linear rails, ball screws, and moving machine components from chips, coolant, oil, and debris. The cover material rolls and unrolls smoothly on a spring-loaded or motorized mechanism as the machine axis moves, providing continuous protection with minimal space requirement.

Ideal for high-speed and long-travel applications, roll-up covers are widely used on CNC machines and automation systems where conventional covers are not feasible. Their lightweight construction ensures smooth operation while improving machine reliability and reducing maintenance.

hero_media.note: PHOTOGRAPH OF ROLL WAY COVER WITH HOUSING AND WITHOUT HOUSING.

cards.title: Roll-up cover without housing
cards.description: Roll-up covers without a housing are suitable for areas with limited space, and facilitate optimal integration into the machine enclosure.

cards.title: Roll-up cover with housing
cards.description: Roll-up covers with a housing protect the roll-up cover and enable simple assembly, also retrofitting. The complete system provides selectable fixing possibilities and a defined belt outlet position.

type_sections_with_pictures.title: Roll-up cover without housing
body: Highly tear-resistant due to plastic-coated special fabric in different material thicknesses and designs
Protection against chipping waste, oils and cooling emulsions
Little space required
Fixing via fixing angle bracket or integration within the machine

type_sections_with_pictures.title: Roll-up cover with housing
body: Steel belt made of rust-resistant and acid-resistant spring steel strip in material thicknesses from 0.2 to 0.4 mm
Plastic belt made of special fabric in different material thicknesses and designs
Steel roller belts only available in combination with housing
Protection against chipping waste, oils and cooling emulsions
For high travel speeds and loads.

items: Stainless steel or composite cover materials (application-specific)
Reinforced edges available for increased wear resistance

Material selection based on speed, temperature, and environment

hero.title: TELESCOPIC SPRING COVERS
body: Spring covers protect spindles, columns, shafts, threads and rod guides reliably against contamination, chips and mechanical damage. They provide a good sealing function, and are self-cleaning if installed in a suitable position. High temperature resistance and resistance to chemicals guarantee reliable protection even under extreme operating conditions.

Telescopic springs – also known as spiral springs or spring guards – have been developed to protect against accidents and mechanical damage wherever there are rotating parts, such as spindles or shafts. They are designed to follow the motion of the machine by spring force.

hero.title: TELESCOPIC COVERS
body: Telescopic Steel Way Covers

Telescopic steel way covers provide heavy-duty protection for machine slideways, linear guides, ball screws, and critical moving components. Designed to operate smoothly along the machine axis, they protect against chips, swarf, coolants, oils, and mechanical impact, helping extend machine life and reduce downtime. Available in custom sizes and configurations for horizontal, vertical, and multi-axis applications, they are ideal for CNC machines and industrial automation equipment.

items: Guidance: Roller-based or sliding shoe system
Wipers: Oil- and coolant-resistant polyurethane / rubber
Finish: Powder-coated or painted as specified

Designed to customer drawings or machine parameters

items: High resistance to hot chips, coolant, and cutting fluids
Smooth telescopic movement with low friction
Compact stacking for maximum usable travel
Long operational life in harsh machining conditions

items: Milling, turning, boring, and grinding machines

hero.title: CABLE CARRIERS SYSTEMS
body: At Sign Age we are dealing in world-class cable and hose carriers in a wide range of sizes and types for a variety of environments. We can engineer a carrier system that will maximize productivity and minimize costs for an unlimited number of applications- from offshore drilling rigs to automated machining centers. Because Sign Age offers its customers a complete line of both plated, high strength steel and durable glass-fiber reinforced nylon carrier systems; choice of the most appropriate, cost effective carrier system is yours.

Cable chains will secure, store and guide to all types of movable equipment’s. These are connected together at intervals by stays and several link variant, in different sizes. It offers robust construction, high load capacity and long life.

catalog.name: CNC Sheet Metal Enclosures & Precision Assemblies

hero.title: CNC SHEET METAL ENCLOSURES & PRECISION ASSEMBLIES
body: Integrated Fabrication for Global OEMs
We manufacture precision CNC sheet metal enclosures, cabinets and fully assembled fabricated systems for industrial OEM customers.
From laser-cut components to complete welded and powder-coated assemblies, our facility supports structured production workflows aligned to international quality expectations.
We combine engineering interpretation capability with controlled fabrication processes — delivering export-ready industrial solutions.
